subject_terms_3: Building and Construction  Public buildings  visual arts Artistic photography
materials_name: gelatin  paper (fibre product)  silver sulfide  baryta paper
object_work_type: gelatin silver prints  photographic prints colour prints (photographs)
physical_appearance: Central to this coloured gelatin silver print is a piler. Around it, there are numerous construction workers who don a safety helmet. In the background, there are blocks of high rise apartment houses. There is a strip of yellow running across the top of the image.
sgcool_label_text: Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This is a very early and unique print shot on colour film.
subject_terms_1: pile driving  construction sites constructing  construction workers apartment houses piles (structural elements)
